ingredients.content: 140 g carrots, cut in pieces (4 cm)
60 g spring onions, cut in pieces (4 cm)
550 g white cabbage (approx. 1 small head), core removed, cut in pieces
Â¼ tsp fine sea salt, or to taste

preparations.content: Place parsley in mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add carrots, spring onions, raisins and peanuts then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a serving bowl and set aside.
Place curry powder, cabbage and mayonnaise in mixing bowl then chop <b>8 sec/speed 4<b> while stirring with aid of spatula. Add to serving bowl then stir to combine. Season with salt to taste.
Serve immediately or refrigerate until required.
